description: Complete system overview documenting the multi-provider lead generation system architecture, task orchestration framework, and key business components
Detailed documentation of the proprietary R27 lead scoring system, industry-specific scoring rules, and the AI-powered personalization engine
Documentation of the multi-provider data collection system including Google Maps, Hybrid Scraper, and Pure Scraper implementations with fallback mechanisms and cost optimization
Technical details of the email verification and scoring system including validation algorithms, scoring rules, and caching strategies
Documentation of industry-specific scoring models, personalization rules, and value proposition mapping across different B2B verticals
